page.title: 08LIFE IN 2085
page.content: In a hundred years time people could be going for holidays in space, or even living there. People may not be working in factories as the work may be done by computers and robots. Transport could be very different as oil resources may have been exhausted, although new vehicles could be invented using other fuels. The clothing people wear will be very different. New materials may be used and wool and animal fibre cloths may not be available. If the world population increases as expected there will be fewer animals, forests and cultivated land. Cities will be even larger. Schools may become obsolete and teaching taken over by computers. In general, we think that the earth will become very crowded and people will have to move into space to live.
